price: 35. por gracia Nuestra. Así es como recompensamos a quienes son agradecidos.
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
